vote.title: Authorize a construction services contract for the Warranted Traffic Signal Installation Group 7, for traffic signal construction at the following four locations: Cockrell Hill Road at Rock Quarry Road; Belt Line Road at Seagoville Road; Jefferson Boulevard at Justin Avenue; Eighth Street at Ewing Avenue - Select Maintenance, LLC, lowest responsible bidder of four - Not to exceed $1,144,358.34 - Financing: Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Funds)
vote.description: Authorize a construction services contract for the Warranted Traffic Signal Installation Group 7, for traffic signal construction at the following four locations: Cockrell Hill Road at Rock Quarry Road; Belt Line Road at Seagoville Road; Jefferson Boulevard at Justin Avenue; Eighth Street at Ewing Avenue - Select Maintenance, LLC, lowest responsible bidder of four - Not to exceed $1,144,358.34 - Financing: Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Funds)
